about_the_game:
The war is almost lost...

The intergalactic Fuhrgulf empire is about to destroy the rebels, in their last desperate move a suicide raid is sent to the planet Axel, to sabotage the heart of the Fuhrgulfarian war machine.
However, you are the only one who has made it to the planet's surface alive.
Now the fate of the universe is in your hands.

Intergalatic Panic!! is an action-platformer.

Jump, shoot, and sometimes dive through nine challenging levels, but your actions cost energy, so be careful not to run out at critical moments.

Time to suit up!

By defeating the stage bosses, you will receive unique equipment, up to six different weapons to obliterate enemy Fuhrgulfarians or other dangers that cross your path, and up to six different costumes with incredible powers to enhance your combat strategies.

Buckle up, please.

During your adventure you will also find some vehicles, powerful weapons left behind by the resistance to help you in your mission.

Shenanigans...

Speaking of mission, it is not a simple task, destroy eight fortresses used by the Fuhrgulf empire to produce their terrible war machines and each fortress is guarded by a captain of the empire and they will not be very happy with your visit.

name: Intergalactic Panic!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 with integrated graphics (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 (equivalent or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 TI (equivalent or higher)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Jump and shoot your way through forgotten oceans and into fortresses filled with powerful enemies. Decide the best order to complete the challenges and each stage will give you an amazing new power to help you on your next journey and perhaps end the tyranny of the evil Intergalactic Empire.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil
